DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Cases select study must meet following criterion : Female Scheduled routine screening mammography routine breast biopsy nonpalpable finding Any ethnic origin Exclusion Criteria Patients meeting follow criterion exclude study : Any contraindication mammography Pregnant suspicion pregnant , nurse Patients palpable lesion Patients internal breast marker region interest Breast implant , without displace view Significant recent breast trauma/acute mastitis Patient previously undergo excisional breast biopsy Patients history breast cancer Unable unwilling give consent
